author: Predeactor
description: Obtain lyrics from music you want to search.
install_msg:
Hello, this cog require an API key from KSoft.SI, to add one, go to https://api.ksoft.si and add your bot, wait for obtaining your token and register it by using `[p]set api ksoftsi api_key <Your API key>`.
You need to use the v1 token, not v2.
